content.detailedDescription: My mother was outside smoking around 8:30pm when she observed a red glowing light around tree top level moving at around 20 miles per hour. she yelled for me to come outside and look at it. i came outside and saw what she was pointing at and started filming it on my iphone camera. it had a red glow to it as i caught the remaining 20 seconds before it left our field of view. my mother who saw around 2 minutes of it said to her when it was at the mid point of her viewing area that she could see a disk like outline and that it had about 5-6 protrusion type areas. she described it as wart like looking as the best description she could come up with. i sent my brother my iphone video of what i caught and he pulled some still pictures from it after zooming in on the object. it was traveling from north to south and maybe 100 feet above treetop level.
content.summary: Slow moving red glowing disk like object around treetop level

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I had just left my house when i looked up toward the sky, and saw an orange light, that looked sort of like an ember. it didn't appear to be moving fast, so didn't think much of it, assuming it was an airplane. i then noticed that there was no blinking lights. i watched it for about a min, until it sort of began to flicker and fade/disappear. 

i'm not sure what it was, though i doubt it was a flying saucer, due to the fact that it was apparently slow moving. perhaps something entering orbit and burning in the atmosphere?
content.summary: Glowing orb

content.detailedDescription: Between 11:00pm.And 11:15pm., on the 7th of august 2013. as i was going out of the back, door facing west to take my dog for a walk, as i do every night. i saw what appeared to be 2 (two) satellites of different sizes, and brightness. they almost appeared as if they were moving in tandem. these objects were what looked like that they were above most communication. the lead object appeared about the size, and reflective brightness of the international space station. the trailing or following object appeared to be the size of a communication satellite. i asked my son if he was seeing the same thing that i was watching. he responded with a yes. they passed between the first 2 (two) stares in the handle of the big dipper as they moved toward the east. they kept about the same distance apart. the lead object made a change in its course from west to east to an east-northeasterly direction the following object also made the same change in its course, as they passed through cassiopeia. just after they passed through cassiopeia, the trailing object sped up slightly, and shot something at the lead object. which got a whoa response from both my son and myself. it looked like it hit the lead object, but there was no apparent change to the object. at least there was not any visible damage from the ground. like i stated before these objects were way up there. the entire event took only roughly 45-50 seconds a minute at the most. i watched both objects until they flew out of sight. they appeared to be at an elevation slightly higher than normal communication satellite, or at least they appeared to be. i live in a town where there are less than 135 people. even though it is lit up fairly well you can see more stars than in a town or city with a larger population. therefore, i watch the night sky on regular basics i know what satellites,   aircraft, both fixed wing and helicopters, meteorites all look like. as stated previously stated these objects looked like satellites. i have never seen satellites act in this manner before.
content.summary: I saw  2 satellites different sizes the 1st larger than the 2nd sizes 2nd spedup & and shot something at at the 1st

content.detailedDescription: Came out of friends garage, with a friend to leave. as i was driving away i noticed her looking at the sky. i looked the same direction it was a strange orange and white/yellow glowing object. color was almost radiating in and out. it was too high up to be a helicopter, the lights were not like a plane nor was it moving straight across the sky like a plane would. there was no noise. i reversed my vehicle and got out to be by my friend and see what she thought about it. we were both flipping out, because this was not anything we had ever seen before. she said she saw it come up above the tree line. it moved in a rocking back and forth motion while moving across the sky, very smooth in its movements. it then continued straight for a bit, before it left our sight by rising higher in the sky, not by continuing straight out of sight.
content.summary: Orange glowing ball, that wavered back and forth in air, while moving easterely, went away by getting higher in sky

content.detailedDescription: It went into a cloud there was a flashes lighting  to orbs
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Tell me what you think

content.detailedDescription: At around 9:15 we were just checking on our dogs and locking up the gate for the night, when i was closing the gate, i looked towards the south sky and noticed 2 bright lights. one red and the other bluish green,i thought it was a helicopter or plane so i checked to make sure that i had latched the gate and when, i looked back at where the object was, i noticed that there were no blinking lights, as there normally are on planes and such. all of a sudden, it turned to the west in a very fluid motion so i called my husband who had the binoculars and told him to hurry. i was trying to record it with my phones camera but he got a much better view with the binoculars. what he saw through them was what he described as a rack of "billiard balls". with the bottom right "ball" being red and the rest being bluish green then more reds appeared along the bottom. and then as it started to descend, it changed into 2 "balls" of light, one being red and the other one blue. it moved very irratically but very fluidly at the same time. from side to side, up then down and then it just finally descended out of view. i did get some video from my phone but it isn't very good. all you see is a pulsating light and a lot of talking.
content.summary: saw bright red and bluish green lights, in a triangle changing flight patterns. it stopped and did a 180` direction change several times then it descended out of view

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving my car and i saw a bright light in the sky over los angeles area. it was moving very slowly and sometimes it's stops . i stopped the car in a parking lot and took a video.  
2. it was not an ordinary sight . it doesn't look like an airplane or something like that so i saw immediately that it's something different this time .
3. that is a ufo for sure!!!
4. dome , half circle, disc like. moving very slow.
5. i was so excited and i thought that i imagine it so i ask someone and he was shocked as well. 
6. i have to keep driving so i couldn't stay and look where it goes.
content.summary: I saw a dome shape ufo over los angeles area.

content.detailedDescription:
My son woke me at 410am on 2/9/14 telling me he had been watching a ufo for 20 minutes or more, we watched it from my room for around 30 minutes then got in my van and began to head toward it. it was higher than we thought so it must have been large. we parked on a country road and watched for another hour until some clouds passed over before daylight then it was gone.
it was like a star but very large, then white light would become tiny and you could see red light under it. then it would get large again, over and over, hovering the whole time, movement was minimal.
my son videoed it on his phone but it looks like a light in the sky.
this was really cool.
content.summary: Bright light then dimming and red under it

content.detailedDescription: I was outside the front on my house smoking a cigaret at 7:10pm on february 10th 2014.. i was in the town of patchogue new york . it was so bright in the sky it's almost impossible to miss. i knew as soon as i saw it , that it definitely could not be a star and had to be a ufo. i called out my 2 daughters & wife from the house to confirm that i wasn't insane & they saw the same thing . i also called my mother in law who lives roughly 3 blocks away to see the object as well . as i continued to stand outside to observe the object, i spotted a jet which looked to be from our united states jets . it zipped past the object . there was visible smoke lines left in the sky from the jet which appeared to be checking out the ufo . it's currently 8:13 and the object is continuing to move around the moon slowly . it's now 8:15 and the object in the sky appears to be going with the orbit in the moon. it's 8:20 currently & there's a small object appearing on the right side if the moon. both objects i took a peak at through binoculars slightly & both appear as identical flying objects
content.summary: Saw ufo thru binaculars disk shaped with lights going around and in center to the left of the moon moving slowly not to far from moon

content.detailedDescription:
My son woke me at 410am on the morning of 2/9/14 and told me to look out my window. he said he had been watching a ufo for 20 minutes, i looked out my window and he and i watched it for around 30 minutes then we got in my car and tried to get closer. 
it was a bigger than star light very bright then it would get small, you could see some red at the bottom of it then it would get big again. it seemed to be attached to something very large that was hovering at about a 10degree angle. it looked close enough that i thought we could get close but the closer we got it was further so it must have been really large. this went on for an hour then clouds came over and then it was gone.
it was pretty cool.
content.summary: My son woke me, bright light large then small go then red under it

content.detailedDescription: I was sky watching on a fall night as i usually do. i looked in the sky to my north and i saw a circle like shape in the sky. as i watched this shape it grew amd became brighter and more visible and began to open wider. as i sat there with my girlfriend i was recording this activity i seen ufos flying into this vortex. i received a phone call and i walked away for two minutes it had started to get smaller and started to disappear from visible sight. at first i was extremely shocked and felt chills this event lasted for 20_30 minutes and i was in shock so after i came to i started recording.
content.summary: I believe what i witnessed was a vortex ufos flew into

content.detailedDescription: I was a ny state corrections officer on my way to work at chateaugay correctional facility on rt 11 . at approx. 10:30 p.M. a very huge bright light caught my eye at maybe 1/2 mile or less in distance . i kept watching as i was driving and suddenly it started going up and down very quickly. i pulled over to get a better look and the object lurched forward a couple of times at an amazingly quick rate of speed and then up . as i reached for my hunting binoculars while never taking my eyes off of the object which was now approx. 1/4 of a mile away it shot all the way over to the canadian horizon leaving a trail of light and disappeared from my view. there was no noise that i could hear and the stream of light reminded me of the same stream of light displayed on the show star trek when they go into hyper drive , that is the best way i can describe it. when i arrived at the prison another officer was telling his story because he had seen it also. i stopped him and stated what i had just saw and the other officers concurred that he had just said the same thing. i was in the u.S. navy for four years and saw just about every jet that our military has and never have i ever seen anything that would even come close to the maneuvering and speed capability of that craft. i also lived near plattsburgh air force base for 19 years and would see their aircraft taking off and landing at night on thousands of occasions and they all make plenty of noise that can be heard from long distances .
content.summary: Huge bright light moving erratically but in northern direction

content.detailedDescription:
2-9-2014, 5:15 am, working out in outdoor pool in our lake las vegas home facing east.  observed venus and wondered if i could take a picture of it with my cellphone.  i got out of the pool, focused in on venus and noticed a strange pulsating light above and to the right of venus.  the pulsating light did not seem to be visible to the naked eye, it was only visible through the camera lens.  it looked so odd that 
i took a couple still shots then switched to video and videoed a few ten-second videos if it.  
the object seemed to be stationary, and did not seem to move during my approximate five minute observation.
content.summary: Have video of pulsating light which appeared in eastern sky

content.detailedDescription: On approximately, september 14, 2013 (i know it was a weekend, my husband age 33, my 7 year old child, and i age 37 were walking through the field back to the house after checking on the chickens in the chicken coup. it was approximately 2100 hours. i noticed a light in the south west area above the tree line and below the clouds. it was a clear night, i originally thought it was shooting star. it had a ball like head with a tail just like a meteor coming into the atmosphere. i quickly got my husband and daughters attention to look at the shooting star when the tail burned out. i thought it had burned up in the atmosphere and was done. then the white/yellow ball traveling towards the west changed direction 180 degrees and started to the east at that time the tail reappeared like a jet propulsion. i then realized it was definitely not a shooting star. the object did this several times turning right and left with the tail disappearing and reappearing. then as it was heading in a southwest direction the light turned off and was no longer viable. we did not hear anything. it was an unusually quite night.There was a tall radio tower that was in the background. i also noticed a plane the was flying by which turned direction and flew by the object we were looking at. it appeared to be watching the object as i do not usually see a plane change its flight path in the sky as it did. my husband and i were both amazed at what we saw. we both knew it was a ufo.
content.summary: Looked like a shooting star that the tail faded in and out with direction change and plane flying by it and turning around to look at it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was the passenger in a car, travelling west over the m2motorway bridge.
looking south up river i noticed two reddy orange lights rotating and climbing at 45 degrees, over the river but a long way off.Southerly direction.
it was very windy, with high cloud cover. occasional light rain squals.
i looked away thinking it was probably two chinese lanterns tied together, but on reflection the weather was so rough a small paper lantern would not climb like that or stay alight.
so i looked back and where the lights were climbing up to, there was now four stationary lights high in the sky, same colour as before and same size widely spaced very high in a perfect rectangle. possibly a mile or so up river. i knew they weren't really close up as their aspect didn't change during the whole traversing of the bridge which is three quarters of a mile long.
the wind was gale force i do not believe it was an aeroplane, helicopter, weather balloon, fireworks or any man made flying object, the weather conditions were extreme, even the car i was in was being buffeted by the strong winds. these lights were perfectly stationary.
i observed them until the car passed through a cutting in a hill side and they were then out of view.
this observation unnerved me, i am an engineer by trade and aviation enthusiast, i am fully aware of the characteristics of man made flying machines.
i am convinced these "lights" were not of this earth, so much so even though stories of ufo's have always fascinated me, i was always sceptical i wish i hadn't seen it.
i firmly believe we are not alone.
content.summary: Two lights rotating around a common centre, climbing up to four static lights

content.detailedDescription: It was saturday evening (twighlight)february 8th, 2014.  i was walking into church at around 5:30 with my 14 year old daughter.  i looked up and and above the church, in teh sjy was what looked like an enormous meteor or comet with a tail.  at first i thought it was one of those "whispy" like clouds but then i could see a red dot at the head of this thing.  i continued to watch it after i got into church because i could see it through one of the windows.  i watched it for a good 10-15 more minutes until it disappeared.  i am sure it was moving because i watched it gradually descend over the horizon through the window. i thought that it might be a comet or meteor but when i googled it, there were no reports of such events on that day.
content.summary: Saw what appeared to be a comet or meteor

content.detailedDescription: In 2008 my wife and i were walking the beach in perdido key, florida. i noticed something strange. which was a black cloud over the gulf of mexico. this particular cloud stood out because all the other clouds were white or natural in color. the black cloud began moving towards my wife and i. i was not aware that my wife were paying attention or not. now this cloud was black in color, a black i've never seen or witnessed before. this is what made it so strange. the cloud headed streight for us. when it reached us it hovered about one hundred twenty five or fifty feet above and in front of us. there was no sound to it at all. then there was a flash of light that lit up the cloud. what i saw next astounded me beyond belief. there was a craft within the cloud with windows and a being was looking right at me and my wife. i told my wife that we must go back to the house. as we rushed away. the black cloud was still there, then it left on the same path it came. it went back out in the gulf of mexico and vanished. i wasn't sure that my wife had payed attention to this whole event until she approched me and said, did you see that and i said what? she said that cloud and that thing in it. she said to me, what was it? and i said i think we say a ufo. i shall never forget it.
content.summary: Ufo hovered over my wife and i

content.detailedDescription: I was walking the dog, i was out for 2 or 3 min. when i looked to the east over the tree line, when i first saw the lower light. it flashed a dull but fairly  large light, then about 2 seconds later above and to the left 4 lights flashed in line from right to left. then it repeated. i ran in to the house almost dragging the dog, to get my wife to make sure i wasn't seeing something that wasn't there. when i returned to the door i did not see it again. there was no sound that i could hear, and from the distance that it was from me it had to be very large.
content.summary: The lights flashed  one lower than the other four

content.detailedDescription:
me, my brother, and my cousin biked to ropesville cemetery to visit my grandfather's grave. the moon wasn't out at that time, around 11 pm. i was 22, my brother's 18, and my cousin's 21. 
  at my grandfather's grave, we saw lights in the sky slowly approaching from the southwest. as they neared, we saw the lights were in the shape of a triangle with a fourth light in the center. the craft passed directly over the cemetery, silent except for what sounded like wind noise. 
  we thought the triangle pattern of the lights was very strange. but we assumed it was probably a b2 stealth bomber because we were under the impression that stealth meant silence. recently, we learned that this isn't the case: stealth only means invisible to radar. 
  also, a heavy plane like a b2 flying at the slow speed of this craft would probably have fallen out of the sky. can't be sure how fast it was going, but it seemed like maybe 70 mph or so. 
  very slow, very low.
  we couldn't quite see the body of the craft, only the lights, but we got the impression the lines between the lights were very straight and clean. 
  we watched it for a few minutes as it passed over us and headed northeast, the three of us talking about how weird it was.
  about a week ago, my brother and i saw a history channel documentary about the belgian ufo which was also a black triangle with four lights, three as the traingle and one in the center. we wish we could remember the color of the lights on the traingle we saw, maybe red or white or both.
  after we biked home that night, i wrote this entry in my journal:
  "as we sat there a plane passed overhead. it was very strange. it had four lights, one in the center, and the others forming a triangle. speculated it might be a stealth plane, and it did look like that. passing low and very quiet, directly over the graveyard."
content.summary: Saw three lights in form of triangle with a fourth light in center. it flew directly overhead, making no sound except perhaps slight wind noise. it was flying low and seemed to be going slow, maybe 70 mph. very strange.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the rv park putting sealant around the vents on the roof of my motorhome.  my sister told me to look behind me so i did.  as i turned around i saw a ufo traveling ne.  i picked up my mag light and flashed the object and it stopped, hovered and then came toward me and stopped.  it came toward me again and stopped. it flashed me with a beam, hovered a second and them headed back toward where it first came from.  it then shot fast into space and disappeared!  it tried to communicate with me with the beam i am sure, as i was flashing it with my flashlight!
as far as how i felt about the whole situation, i was not afraid as i have had closer encounters and encounters all of my life.  i was shocked and excited at the same time as i did not expect the object to respond to my communication attempt.  i was however happy that the communication attempt was successful and that it responded to me.
content.summary: Saw a ufo traveling ne.  flashed it with a flashlight and it stopped and turned coming toward me.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dogs in the woods in western ny when the dogs noticed a sphere of light moving over the trees above us.  the object was a luminous ball of light that moved slowly to watch us and came toward me. it was a beautiful light but, it did not seem natural and frightened me.  i walked back to the house and the dogs barked at it sending it rapidly up to space.  i do not know what it was or if it is some military spy technology being tested.  

this thing has returned since that date and it has been seen by another neighbor, too.  it seems to want to communicate or get a closer look at us.  just hope it belongs to our government.
content.summary: Sphere of light in sky above pine trees.  suddenly noticed me walking the dogs and followed us.  the dogs barked at it and it finally moved away in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was just waiting for my bus at the bus stop, when i noticed a strange object hovering just pass a bulding, i decided to take photos of it every 2-5 minutes until my bus came so you could see the daylight in the background change to show you how long this object was staionary. 

i didnt see it leave or show up, i kinda just noticed it, i zoomed in and put 3 different shots together and will be sending the originals aswell. i wanted to record a video but my phone was almost dead.

i immediately knew what i was witnessing, because it didnt flash any lights, but reflected some sort of light. i felt lucky to witness a ufo , and will feel better knowing these pictures get looked at and hopefully we can come up with something on it. thanks!


sorry for delay by the way
content.summary: Noticed an object hovering while waiting for my bus.

content.detailedDescription: I saw some lights. large in diameter one red, three white, left to right. and two sets of them fairly close together but not same position horizontally or vertically. it looked like two objects.  i saw them about 7:33 pm thursday, jan 30, 2014 at tucson, az. . i was on my porch and i have a western view of sombrero peak. i am about cortaro rd & thornydale. i saw them two times about 30 seconds the 1st time. i also saw commercial aircraft and it's lights the whole time i watched the unidentified lights disappear. it actually looked as if they went into a cloud, but having been able to see the commercial aircraft lights the whole time i started to doubt the cloud idea. there were clouds, but i couldn't identify any in that area. my guess at the time is that these lights were over i-10 and about the cortaro rd area. never heard a noise. i left after not seeing them after about ten minutes. i went into my kitchen a few minutes after. i have the same view from there and the lights were back but only for 10 seconds or so. i didn't see anything after that. i have heard a low droaning noise for the last few days. my 84 year old mother can't hear it. it drives me crazy. i've heard it off and on for years but can only hear it in the house except this week i could hear it as i got out of my car in my driveway. i don't know if either are connected. but i haven't heard the droan since thursday nite. i have a buddy at yuma mine rd and wade rd. we happened to text shortly after i saw these lights. he didn't see a thing.
content.summary: 4 lights on 2 different objects. left red. other 3 white in a horizontal line. moving towards north. then slight rotation ccw and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
On a summer night in 1978 in washington state, the witness was standing on the grass in a schoolyard when he noticed a 'streak of white light' above him in his right peripheral vision. he at first thought he had missed a falling star... but then it dawned on him that it didn't go past a small cotton cloud above him to the right.

as he stood there suspiciously eyeballing the cloud, a 'creeping sensation' came over him, that there was something 'watching him' from behind that cloud. he decided to sucker it in by taking a couple of steps away, then stop and look up again to see if whatever it was behind this cloud would reveal itself.

sure as darkness... an 'orange glowing crystal ovoid' went horizontally from that cloud, across to behind a another cloud above his head to the left. 

the witness was awestruck. he stood there a while to see if anything else would happen, or if it would come out. when nothing did, he left... feeling uneasy / realizing that he could be seized at any moment. 

the witness adds that the two cotton clouds were about 725 ft above him; at a 75-80 degree angle looking up in front of him; and 45 degrees on both sides of him. there were no other clouds nearby.

the object wasn't a brilliant light; it was a 'clean glow'... similar to a light bulb in an 'opaque lamp'. but instead of seeing the light bulb, it was uniformly glowing, and looked just like a 'glowing orange crystal ovoid'. there was no sound or other lights to it.
content.summary: Witness observed a 'streak of white light' above his head that stopped behind a cloud. it then emerged as an orange glowing crystal ovoid that passed horizontally to hide behind another cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling north on state highway 3 in washington state from bremerton to silverdale to go to a restaurant with my 27 year old daughter. the conditions were clear with no rain. the time was approximately 9:10pm on friday, january 17, 2014. my daughter first saw the ball of light and asked me what it was. 
i looked to my left and looked up and saw the brightest orange/red light that i have ever witnessed in my life. it was right across the highway just at the top of the tall pine trees. it was much larger than a light would be for a tower, street light or house light.  we both were trying to figure out what it could be and were quickly ruling out all obvious causes for such a phenomenon. it was a circle of such a vivid brightness of orange and red. i have not seen such a vivid color before(the closest example of the color would be comparable to active lava, which i have seen in hawaii). it did not hurt your eyes to look at it. did not emit anything. i slowed down but kept driving. as i passed the object and could no longer see it i told my daughter to keep an eye on it as long as she could. 
she stated that a white light appeared to come from it like it was splitting or appearing from behind it. then the second light disappeared. she said it was slowly rising above the tree line. then the road curved and it was out of our sight of vision. 
just over an hour later we drove back along the same highway and did not see the light there again. when we returned to our hotel we looked up on the internet and we were surprised to find that there have been other witnesses to such a phenomenon.
when we first saw it you are trying to process what it could possibly be. it is not until after that you realize that you saw something very unusual and wish that you had thought about taking a picture. now i understand how people do not often capture things on film because it is usually after the event that you realize what you witnessed.
content.summary: Traveling north on state highway 3 saw a very bright orange/red ball of light hovering just above the tree line right off the side of the highway.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out the front door when i spoted it to the north east may have been east of sante. fe nm.It was moveing fast then stoped and shot up then went west then east no stop when changing its flight.When the other aircraft got close it went east then went in to a cloud bank.It did this for may be 20 minutes then it just vanished.
content.summary: A light movfast then would stop then shot up then sideways without stopping its movements were sharp and fast

content.detailedDescription: It was about 7:20 pm ne of decorah, ia when i was sitting in my living room facing east and i saw a bright glowing white light which was traveling in a southerly direction.  it caught my attention because it did not blink and no other color lights appeared to be present.  it may have been a plane or helicopter but it was much brighter than airplanes or helicopters i have seen in the past and it did not have blinking lights. it was also descending at a high rate of speed and was much too big to be a shooting star.  i lost sight of it behind a ridge line but probably viewed it for 5 seconds.
content.summary: Bright circular light appeared to be falling out of the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
One summer night in 1978 in washington state, while working as a lot man at a drive-in theater, the witness was standing under a tree when he noticed a powder grey object off to his left in the air. at first he thought it was an owl flying.

he doesn't know why he kept watching it (peculiar intuition?), but then as it was arcing horizontally the object slanted a little onto its side and turned a white light. that was when he realized it wasn't an owl.

about five seconds later, the light faded and the object was powder grey again. but, less than five seconds afterwards, he witnessed the object entering what appeared to be a'vertical slit' in the night sky.

seconds before it smoothly entered this opening, he could see the front of the object literally becoming--or appeared to be--sparkling pieces of light. once it fully entered and was gone, the night sky was its normal vast darkness with scattered stars.

he knows what he saw and observed, but was in wow...He didn't know what to think or say to anyone about having just seen a ufo!

the whole viewing lasted about one minute from start to finish.

witness also notes that, from the slightly 'parallel angle' he was at, he could almost see inside the vertical slit. the opening had a 'blue / pure glitter' to it from top to bottom, which was similar to beveled glass.
content.summary: Grey object observed in night sky changing to white light, fading, then to sparkling light as it enters a 'slit' in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing out in front of my grandparents home in stockton, ca. where i used to live. i was having a cigarette outside. just a regular day... 

i heard this extremely loud rumbling of a sound, almost like a thunder storm but, deeper pitched. it was then i was looking up and saw the sky ripple and change color all in a second or two. the sky changed from a neon purple to an amber color, and then back to normal all in the same moment. it looked like the sky changed for a second. the best way i can describe the way the sky moved, it was like a boat creating a ripple/wake as it moves through water, in the same way i saw the sky ripple. the whole sky, not just the sky directly overhead of me..... the whole sky...

i instantly knew this was something extraordinary. i looked around me to see if anyone else saw what i had just seen. no neighbors were outside, no cars driving by. i knew this was something big in the sense that it had to have been seen by everyone outside at the moment. it left a greyish orange trail behind it... astonished at what i had just seen i went onto my laptop to try to figure out what it was..... 

i couldn't find much information at all about what i had just witnessed besides what's known as a sonic boom from a jet. but it was not the same as a jet sonic boom. it made a loud rumbling sound followed by a fading crackle sound. i just knew this had to be seen or at least heard by more people than myself. 

i got back online around 9 or 10 to see if a news team had anything on what took place that late afternoon... no story at all. 

i do not know what this was. i experienced this a couple years ago now, and it still bothers me that i do not know what it was. 

if you guys have any information as to what this may have been i would really appreciate it. i have only told a couple people about this. just looking for some kind of explanation. thanks again.

- chris mullen
content.summary: Sonic boom flew over me. it changed the sound, but also the color of the sky momentarily, made the sky ripple as if like water.

content.detailedDescription: Outside of home about to get in car when myself and two other people witnessed a light travelling northbound across the sky of milton keynes, england. our initial thought was star, but it was moving. our second guess was an aircraft, which we all discounted as there was no sound, neither the common lights observed. as a keen aircraft spotter i quickly discounted this. next we thought a shooting star, but it was too slow and there was a very dull light coming from the top of this bright red object. we all later agreed we were witnessing a ufo.  the light was travelling too slow to be a shooting star or a plane; it was silent as well which discounts any type of aircraft at the proximity i was witnessing it at.
content.summary: A large light travelling north at reasonable speed
